product_overview: ODIADEV AI Nigerian Voice Receptionist is an AI-powered voice-based receptionist solution designed specifically for Nigerian businesses. It integrates advanced speech-to-text, language model processing, and text-to-speech technologies to provide intelligent, natural, and localized voice interactions for lead qualification, appointment booking, and customer engagement.
core_goals: Provide ultra-low latency, real-time voice interaction for Nigerian businesses.
Enable natural conversation flow with voice activity detection and high-quality speech synthesis in Nigerian English.
Offer a comprehensive AI receptionist that can handle lead qualification and appointment booking using advanced LLM capabilities.
Deliver a localized user experience with pricing, UI, and language tailored to the Nigerian market.
Ensure secure and maintainable deployment with centralized configuration and robust security practices.
key_features: Landing Page with market-specific localized content, pricing in Nigerian Naira (₦), testimonials, and team information.
Detailed Pricing Page with tier-based plans (Starter, Pro, Business) tailored for Nigerian businesses.
Interactive Demo Page showcasing the AI receptionist capabilities with live demos and example scenarios.
Contact and Trial Signup forms with business information capture and direct WhatsApp link.
Voice Streaming Orchestrator that manages real-time ultra-low latency audio streaming between Deepgram STT, Groq LLM, and MiniMax TTS.
Deepgram Speech-to-Text API integration for real-time voice transcription with WebSocket streaming.
Groq LLM (Llama 3.3 70B) integration for intelligent conversational processing, lead qualification, and appointment logic.
MiniMax Text-to-Speech API for natural-sounding Nigerian English voice responses.
Voice Activity Detection to enable seamless conversation flow and reduce unnecessary processing.
Real-time Audio Visualizer providing waveform feedback during voice interactions.
Embeddable Chat Widget with knowledge base, message history, typing indicators, and voice streaming integration.
Centralized Configuration Management for secure API key storage and environment-specific settings.
SEO Optimization targeting the Nigerian market with meta tags, Open Graph, Twitter Cards, and structured data.
Security Configuration ensuring secure API key management, .gitignore usage for sensitive files, and deployment security headers.
user_flow_summary: User visits Landing Page to understand product value and pricing.
User navigates to Pricing Page to evaluate subscription options and FAQs.
User explores Demo Page to interact with AI receptionist via voice or calls.
User fills Contact & Trial Signup form to initiate service onboarding or contacts via WhatsApp link.
Voice Streaming Orchestrator manages user voice input, converting speech to text, processing with Groq LLM, then synthesizing AI's voice with MiniMax TTS, providing real-time responses.
Voice Activity Detection automatically detects speaking activity to facilitate natural turn-taking in conversations.
Chat Widget supports text and voice interactions providing knowledge base answers and maintaining message history.
Administrator or developer manages API keys and model parameters via Configuration Management for security and customization.
validation_criteria: Successful real-time voice transcription with latency under 500 ms using Deepgram STT.
Accurate conversational responses and lead qualification handled by Groq LLM with at least 90% user satisfaction in demos.
Natural, intelligible Nigerian English speech output via MiniMax TTS verified through internal TTS Testing Interface.
Voice Activity Detection correctly detects speech start/stop events with minimal false positives.
Audio Visualizer displays real-time waveforms synchronized with voice input and output.
Landing and Pricing pages show consistent localized Nigerian content and pricing in Naira (₦).
Demo interactions demonstrate smooth, lag-free voice conversation orbased scenario testing.
Secure configuration with no exposure of API keys or sensitive files in public repos.
Chat Widget integrates seamlessly on websites, maintaining message history and typing indicators properly.

features.name: Landing Page
features.description: Main homepage with hero section, problems/solutions, how it works, pricing preview, testimonials, team section, and footer. Fully localized for Nigerian market with ₦ pricing.

features.name: Pricing Page
features.description: Detailed pricing tiers (Starter ₦40,000/mo, Pro ₦95,000/mo, Business ₦220,000/mo) with feature comparison, FAQs, and CTAs for Nigerian businesses.

features.name: Demo Page
features.description: Interactive demo page with WhatsApp demo CTA, call demo number, example scenarios, and explanation of how the AI receptionist works.

features.name: Contact & Trial Signup
features.description: Lead capture form with industry selection, business info collection, WhatsApp direct link, and contact information for ODIADEV AI LTD.

features.name: Voice Streaming Orchestrator
features.description: Core system that coordinates ultra-low latency voice streaming between Deepgram STT, Groq LLM, and MiniMax TTS. Handles real-time audio processing and streaming.

features.name: Deepgram Speech-to-Text Integration
features.description: Real-time speech recognition using Deepgram API with WebSocket streaming. Converts user voice input to text with low latency.

features.name: Groq LLM Processing
features.description: Language model integration using Groq API (Llama 3.3 70B) for intelligent conversation handling, lead qualification, and appointment booking logic.

features.name: MiniMax Text-to-Speech
features.description: High-quality voice synthesis using MiniMax TTS API. Converts AI responses to natural-sounding Nigerian English speech.

features.name: Voice Activity Detection (VAD)
features.description: Detects when user starts/stops speaking to enable natural conversation flow, reduce interruptions, and optimize audio processing.

features.name: Audio Visualizer
features.description: Real-time audio waveform visualization for both user input and AI response. Provides visual feedback during voice interactions.

features.name: Chat Widget
features.description: Embeddable chat widget for websites. Includes knowledge base, message history, typing indicators, and seamless integration with voice streaming.

features.name: Configuration Management
features.description: Centralized configuration system for API keys, model settings, VAD parameters, and streaming settings. Supports environment variables for security.

features.name: Voice Streaming Demo UI
features.description: Standalone demo interface for testing voice streaming functionality with start/stop controls, status indicators, and audio visualization.

features.name: SEO Optimization
features.description: Complete SEO setup with meta tags, Open Graph, Twitter Cards, Schema.org structured data, sitemap, and robots.txt for Nigerian market targeting.

features.name: Security Configuration
features.description: Secure API key management using environment variables, .gitignore for sensitive files, and security headers configuration for Vercel deployment.

features.name: TTS Testing Interface
features.description: Testing interface for validating MiniMax TTS functionality with various text inputs and voice settings.
